pages.title: Scavenger Objective
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Scavenger$() Objective is an Objective you will come across at $(#033dfc)Levels 25 and above$().$(br2)Your goal is to find between $(#033dfc)3 - 6$() Vault items, which can drop from Richity piles found in $(l:get_started/vault_rooms)Vault Rooms$(), from Vault Mobs, or in the Vault Chests.

pages.title: Scavenger Completion
pages.text: To complete the $(#033dfc)Vault$(), you will have to gather all required items and amounts on top of your screen and deposit them into a $(#033dfc)Scavenger Chest$() which can randomly spawn in any $(l:get_started/vault_rooms)Vault Room$().

If you would like the $(l:get_started/vault_crystal)Vault Crystal$() to guarantee the $(#033dfc)Scavenger$() Objective, you may apply a $(#033dfc)Seal of the Hunter$() to your Crystal if said Crystal is not exhausted.
